author: wrowe
msg: As suggested by Josh Slive, add the explicit 'default' to AcceptPathInfo.
I'll leave docs up to him.  The conf becomes a quadstate (undef != default)
but other than that, it should make things cleaner for the user.

author: stas
msg: - create the non-existing directories in the path of files/dirs

author: dougm
msg: use the higher-level way of triggering the port lookup

author: wrowe
msg: A little loopy commit.  Refer mod_cgid users to the mod_cgi docs for
extra info, document the AcceptPathInfo impact in the PATH_INFO comments
of mod_cgi, and document it's configuration in core.
